plot: Betty and Jughead's investigation into the auteur takes a twisted turn after receiving a call from Bret. Archie is forced to make an impossible decision when the person responsible for his father's death needs his help.

Betty and Jughead's investigation into the auteur takes a twisted turn after receiving a call from Bret, and later, Donna. Archie is forced to make an impossible decision when the person responsible for his father's death needs his help. Veronica, Hermosa, and Hermione decide they have had enough of Hiram's reckless behavior when he endangers them once again. Cheryl and Penelope aim to salvage the tainted Blossom name. The murderer and auteur is revealed.—snowflakeaudrey
